snippet: Protesters initially planned to march across the bridge, but will instead begin on Staten Island, where a man died last month after an encounter with the police.
abstract: Rev Al Sharpton, seeking to defuse concerns over planned march across Verrazano-Narrows Bridge protesting aggressive police tactics, says march will instead be held on Staten Island, where Eric Garner died after being put in chokehold by police.
lead_paragraph: Protesters initially planned to march across the bridge, but will instead begin on Staten Island, where a man died last month after an encounter with the police.

headline.main: Protest March in Chokehold Case Is Moved From Verrazano Bridge to Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Protest in Chokehold Case Is Moved to Staten Island
